home_what_can_msg: Select 'Utils' from the menu on the left and use the desired function.
home_why_create_msg: When I'm on the internet, there are times when things are annoying, and I created this because I was too lazy to find a site.
home_can_add_function_msg: You can if you leave an inquiry in Issue, but the developer may be too lazy to do it.
license_ellipsis: ...and all dependencies, libraries, files, etc. included in the repository.
